title: Science Reading Motivation and Strategy Design for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science terminology knowledge and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Applying customized instructional design to improve reading skills and motivation in science for adults with reading disabilities or difficulties

learning_goals: Learners can extract key concepts with over 80% accuracy using structured analysis strategies for scientific texts
Learners can set and fulfill weekly reading goals at least three times based on personalized reading motivation profiles
Learners can improve the scientific logic of project deliverables by over 70% through peer feedback systems

resources: Customized reading materials database for science disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
